nodes.body: :v: alreadydone can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Interestingly, we need a `reverse` for the sublist result:
```
theorem sublistsLen_one {α : Type*} (l : List α) : sublistsLen 1 l = l.reverse.map ([·]) :=
  l.rec (by rw [sublistsLen_succ_nil, reverse_nil, map_nil]) fun a s ih ↦ by
    rw [sublistsLen_succ_cons, ih, reverse_cons, map_append, sublistsLen_zero]; rfl
```
Maybe that means our definition of sublistsLen is slightly off?
I think there might be a primed version too?

[List.sublists](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Std/Data/List/Basic.html#List.sublists) has the desired order but unfortunately [List.sublistsLen](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Data/List/Sublists.html#List.sublistsLen) is more like [List.sublists'](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Std/Data/List/Basic.html#List.sublists'). There isn't a primed `sublistsLen'`.

As this PR is labelled `auto-merge-after-CI`, we are now sending it to bors:

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7255516007/job/19766274516)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7255516007/job/19766273631)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7255516007/job/19766274089)

Can you add the `Lists.sublistsLen` version too, if we don't already have it?

bors d+

Can you add the `Lists.sublistsLen` version too, if we don't already have it?

bors d+

It's not straightforward to use the Finset result to prove this, because there are two layers' difference: `Multiset (Multiset _)` vs `Finset (Finset _)`. One could use  [Finset.map_val_val_powersetCard](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Data/Finset/Powerset.html#Finset.map_val_val_powersetCard) but it's at the end of the file.
I think something along these lines would be good as a comment in the source code.

I've moved [Finset.map_val_val_powersetCard](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Data/Finset/Powerset.html#Finset.map_val_val_powersetCard) up and golfed the proof using the Multiset version.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: `Finset/Multiset.powersetCard 1`

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(LinearAlgebra/Multilinear/Basic): derivative of a multilinear map
